NarrativeElements.moralFocusAgreement: WHAT?! You would forgive nepotism?! I could NEVER!
moralFocusDisagreement: Yeah! Nepotism is the true evil. Really disgusting.

NarrativeElements.surfaceOpinionOnTopic: You know what grinds my gears? Nepotism.
NarrativeElements.agreementText: That/'s right! I am glad you see it that way.
NarrativeElements.disagreementtext: That/'s right! I am glad you see it that way.
NarrativeElements.moralFocusAgreement: You think nepotism is a good idea? Why?
moralFocusDisagreement: Yeah! Nepotism is the true evil. Really disgusting.

NarrativeElements.surfaceOpinionOnTopic: You know what grinds my gears? Nepotism. But I guess sometimes you can only trust family to work in the family business.
NarrativeElements.agreementText: That/'s right!
NarrativeElements.disagreementtext: That/'s right!
